tool.name: Cell types - Downsample Cells
tool.command:
ln -s "${matrix}" matrix.mtx && ln -s "${genes}" genes.tsv && ln -s "${barcodes}" barcodes.tsv && downsample_cells.R --expression-data . --metadata "${metadata}" --cell-id-field "${cell_id_field}" --cell-type-field "${cell_type_field}" --array-size-limit "${array_size_limit}" --output-dir "${output_dir}" --metadata-upd "${metadata_upd}" --cell-count-threshold "${cell_count_threshold}"
#if $exclusions --exclusions "${exclusions}" #end if

param.name: matrix
param.label: Expression matrix in sparse matrix format (.mtx)

param.name: metadata
param.label: Metadata Table
param.help: Metadata file mapping cells to cell types

param.name: cell_type_field
param.label: Cell Type Field
param.help: Name of cell type column in metada file

param.name: exclusions
param.label: Exclusions file
param.help: YAML file with trivial terms and unlabelled cells

param.name: array_size_limit
param.label: Array Size Limit
param.help: Maximum matrix size (product of genes and cells), which will determine given the number of genes in the datasets how many cells to down-sample to. Warning: do not exceed the default value.

param.name: output_dir
param.label: Sampled Data
param.help: Name of the directory for sampled data

param.name: cell_count_threshold
param.label: Lower Cell Number Limit
param.help: The lowest number of cells per cell type to be considered for model training. If count below threshold, cells are removed from dataset.
